author: sky.cactus
content:
> is it accurate to say that we desire client diversity, or are we more interested in its byproduct: network resilience to bugs?
I think it is a combination of resilience to bugs and resilience to capture.  The more clients there are that are being built by isolated teams, the more resilient to bugs we are.  The more clients there are that are being maintained by geographically disparate teams, the more resilient to capture we are.
